comments:

-- Error Log --
Date: Mon Jun 25 19:44:19 EDT 2007
Message: Could not save task list
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylyn
Stack Trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui.TaskListManager.saveTaskList(TaskListManager.java:805)
at org.eclipse.mylyn.tasks.ui.TasksUiPlugin$6.saving(TasksUiPlugin.java:365)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.SaveManager.executeLifecycle(SaveManager.java:343)

I have put some null checks in to deal with both cases.  However, it looks like your workbench got into what should have been an illegal or at least very weird state, where a save participant was called in our plug-in while the plug-in was not loaded.  If you see anything like this again please report.
